front.title: Applicability of NAT-PMP with Service Provider Deployments of Network Address Translation

abstract.t: In an effort to conserve global scope IPv4 address allocations,service providers are deploying network address/port translators intheir interior routing domain and assigning private addresses toresidential and small office subscriber sites. This documentdiscusses the applicability of NAT-PMP is such networks to supportapplication requiring dynamic TCP and UDP port forwarding.
